title: Describing equality
abstract: An earlier version of this article was presented to the Historical, International, Normative Theory (HINT) group at the University of Glasgow. I would like to thank the participants on that occasion, and also Richard Arneson, Jonathan Quong, Hillel Steiner, Stephen de Wijze and an anonymous referee for their helpful written comments. Research for the article was supported by the Arts and Humanities Research Council
